body_html:
On windows, you cannot have linux docker container. Also, on an 32 bit OS you cannot run 64 bit docker containers.
I think what you are proposing is this:
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/56124/can-i-run-a-64-bit-vmware-image-on-a-32-bit-machine
body_text:
On windows, you cannot have linux docker container. Also, on an 32 bit OS you cannot run 64 bit docker containers.
I think what you are proposing is this:
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/56124/can-i-run-a-64-bit-vmware-image-on-a-32-bit-machine
body:
On windows, you cannot have linux docker container. Also, on an 32 bit OS you cannot run 64 bit docker containers.
I think what you are proposing is this:
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/56124/can-i-run-a-64-bit-vmware-image-on-a-32-bit-machine
